name: RealTime Visitors Stats and Geolocation
author: Sunny Verma

sections.description:
This Widget plugin let you inject MapmyUser.com tracking code into your Blog to enable real-time visitor tracking.

About Mapmyuser

Regular statistics packages (like google analytics ) provide you a lot of information, but always in hindsight.
MapMyUser shows you what is going on RIGHT NOW.
We provide you with accurate statistics about which pages are visited and where the users are coming from .

View Demo Stat

For more information visit Mapmyuser

Plugin Features

  • Shows Number of users online on widget
  • Their location on Google Map
  • Visitor Source ( i.e. Google, Yahoo, Bing, Referral Or Direct)
  • Their browser info
  • User Operation system info
  • User IP-address and ISP
  • User country and city
  • Where user is right now on your website
  • Visitor Active Since
sections.installation:
Using the Plugin Manager

  1. Click Plugins
  2. Click Add New
  3. Search for mapmyuser-widget
  4. Click Install
  5. Click Install Now
  6. Click Activate Plugin

Manually

  1. Upload mapmyuser-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to change widget position

To change position of your widget

  1. goto Settings->MapmyUser Widget Settings.
  2. Select your desired position
  3. Click On Update Widget

To Change Widget Color

  1. goto Settings->MapmyUser Widget Settings.
  2. Select Widget Color and Font Color
  3. Click On Update Widget
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

1.1

  • Added Support for Traffic source

1.2

  • Added Support for colored widget
  • Support for browser with disabled javascript

1.3

  • Added hidden tracker support

1.4

  • Fixed to work with WordPress 3.8
